Definition: EHDS refined base model for Functional status

Short: Narrative description of the need for the patient to be continuously assessed by third parties; functional status may influence decisions about how to plan and administer treatments.

Short: Onset date of a condition if known.

Short: The patient assessed from the functional view point.

Short: Functional status assessment of the patient according to a specific assessment scheme.

Short: Standardized code corresponding to the Functional assessment.
